message: Those footsteps...
...Clear.
I lift my head, still in a daze.
I can see only darkness, but I sense his approach.

name: クリア
message: "...Good morning, Aoba."

name: クリア
message: "Lovely weather today―not that you'd know from in here."
Clear gently strokes my cheek. His fingers are cold.
I feel him move behind me. He embraces me tenderly from behind.

name: クリア
message: "How do you feel? Does anything hurt?"

name: クリア
message: "Seems like you're doing well. I'm so glad. It makes me sad when you aren't feeling well."

name: クリア
message: "We'll just take it slow. No need to rush. Right?"
From my chest, Clear slides his fingers down to my stomach, then my thighs, then... ah... His touch is especially affectionate there...
...where my legs used to be.

name: クリア
message: "Aoba..."
He calls my name, voice dripping with joy.

name: クリア
message: "I'm not human. But I still wanted to be with you forever."

name: クリア
message: "The thing about humans is that you all have to die some day, right? Well, I don't like the idea of losing you."

name: クリア
message: "That's why I asked Toue to give you to me."

name: クリア
message: "He told me that I could do whatever I like with you, as long as he gets his data."
Clear buries his face in my hair.

name: クリア
message: "I can't become human, so I want to make you like me."

name: クリア
message: "And while I'm at it, I want to keep you beautiful forever... No, I want to make you even more beautiful. Like a doll."

name: クリア
message: "That's why I have to get rid of all your extra parts. Dolls don't need freedom, you see."

name: クリア
message: "Limbs that you can move give you too many options. You don't need those."

name: クリア
message: "I've already finished with your eyes and legs. Next is your arms. Such bad arms. Wanting. Grasping."
I don't realize I'm grasping the bars until Clear pulls one of my arms away and kisses it... then bites down as hard as he can.
I smell the faint scent of blood as he licks the wound with his moist tongue.
The chain around my neck clinks softly.
I feel no pain, no warmth... nothing at all.
All I can do is breathe.

name: クリア
message: "I'm so excited. I'm sure you'll be even more beautiful when I'm done with you."

name: クリア
message: "I can't wait for you to be... all mine."
Clear's voice softens to a rapt murmur.
Clear has changed.
After the Alphas took him away, they repaired him according to Toue's instructions.
He obeys his true master once more.
...But none of that matters to me now.
Clear is my entire world.
As long as Clear's happy... that's all that matters.
As long as Clear's happy...

name: クリア
message: "Aoba..."
